title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: Hi,I have decided to start trading some of my Quant as I am now 3X but I do not have any trading experience.I know the idea it so sell high & buy back in lower but I don't want to just start doing that without some kind of plan. I hear a lot about the RSI indictation - what time frame is best to use this on? Any advice appreciated
